remarks: Lemma for ~ lgsquad2 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lgsquad2.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
lgsquad2.2 $e |- ( ph -> -. 2 || M ) $.
lgsquad2.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
lgsquad2.4 $e |- ( ph -> -. 2 || N ) $.
lgsquad2.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( M gcd N ) = 1 ) $.
lgsquad2lem1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. NN ) $.
lgsquad2lem1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. NN ) $.
lgsquad2lem1.m $e |- ( ph -> ( A x. B ) = M ) $.
lgsquad2lem1.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( A /L N ) x. ( N /L A ) ) = ( -u 1 ^ ( ( ( A - 1 ) / 2 ) x. ( ( N - 1 ) / 2 ) ) ) ) $.
lgsquad2lem1.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( B /L N ) x. ( N /L B ) ) = ( -u 1 ^ ( ( ( B - 1 ) / 2 ) x. ( ( N - 1 ) / 2 ) ) ) ) $.
lgsquad2lem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( M /L N ) x. ( N /L M ) ) = ( -u 1 ^ ( ( ( M - 1 ) / 2 ) x. ( ( N - 1 ) / 2 ) ) ) ) $.
